GelHost

 

RELAX ABOUT YOUR HOSTING

WE HAVE YOU COVERED!!!

 

https://www.gelhost.com

 

About US?

Gelhost (AMSSGelNet LLC) started back in 2011 with a simple vision of providing costumers with HIGH QUALITY web hosting in LOW BUDGET frame. We are happy that we been able to do so for LAST 3 YEARS for costumers in over 50 countries. Our quality is backed up with industry best 30 days money back Guarantee*.  

 

 

Why Choose US?

24/7/365 Fully Managed SupportWe will do literally anything you ask of us! Some examples are...


  •  


  • Server Hardening: We will harden and secure your server upon your request! This will include firewall setup, BFD, SSH hardening,PHP hardening, and much more....


  • 24X7 Proactive Proactive Monitoring:  If we find your VPS down, we will bring it back up within minutes! You can now sleep well knowing that your websites are online.


  • 3rd Party Software Installation*: You need any 3rd party software installed we will try to install it with pur happiness. For example you need FFMPEG or vBulletin installed we will do it for you.
  •  

Multiple Location - USA & Netherlands Location.

FREE cPanel/WHM - All our managed server comes with FREE cPanel/WHM.

KVM Virtualization - KVM server hard drive cannot be OVERSOLD, which means whatever plan you buy your HD will be solely yours.

FREE SSL Certificate - Secure your domain with Extra protection from SSL.

FREE Domain Name - Receive FREE domain with all Managed package.

FREE Softaculous - Install over 300 script with a click of a button.

FREE Migration - Coming from another host, let us transfer your account for you.

Money Back Guarantee** - Try our service with risk free 30 day money back guarantee!! NO QUESTIONS ASKED. 

Setup - Setup is done Manually. We know we could do it automatically but we prefer to give a personal touch to every VPS server we provide. Setup could take any where from 1 to 12 hours based on the fraud report, verification and setup.

FREE Backup - FREE BACKUP FOR ALL THE NEW CLIENTS!!!.
